summary: Design a high-converting landing page for an Indian handmade handicrafts gifting brand offering curated and customized gift hampers, with a warm, premium, artisan-focused design.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Warm premium hero banner featuring an Indian artisan gifting aesthetic (hero-handicrafts-gifting.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 3 product/hamper card images with handcrafted gift hamper styling (hamper-set-1.dim_900x600.png)
- Set of 3 product/hamper card images with handcrafted gift hamper styling (hamper-set-2.dim_900x600.png)
- Set of 3 product/hamper card images with handcrafted gift hamper styling (hamper-set-3.dim_900x600.png)
- Subtle earthy seamless pattern/texture background (artisan-texture-pattern.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page, high-converting marketing landing page for an Indian handmade handicrafts gifting brand that offers curated and customized gift hampers, using a warm, premium, artisan-focused visual design and consistent styling across all sections.

Implement a conversion-focused hero section with: brand headline/subheadline in English, primary CTA (e.g., “Build My Gift Hamper”), secondary CTA (e.g., “Explore Curated Hampers”), trust signals (e.g., handmade, ethically sourced, pan-India delivery—wording in English), and a premium hero visual.

Add key landing page sections tailored to curated/customized gift hampers: (1) Curated Hampers showcase (3–6 cards), (2) “Customize Your Hamper” step-by-step explainer, (3) Artisan story/values section highlighting handmade craftsmanship, (4) Social proof (testimonials/ratings), (5) FAQ, and (6) final CTA banner.

Implement a lead-capture form for customized hampers that collects: name, email, phone (optional but recommended), occasion type, budget range, preferred items/themes (free text), quantity, delivery city/pincode (text), and an optional notes field; include client-side validation and a success state.

Add basic analytics-friendly structure without external services: semantic headings, consistent section IDs for CTA scrolling, and event hooks in code (e.g., function calls/logs) for key actions (primary CTA click, form submit success).

Ensure the landing page meets baseline UX quality: fast initial render, optimized images, accessible interactions (keyboard-friendly accordions and focus states), and polished microcopy suitable for a premium gifting brand (English only).
Create and apply a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) that evokes warm, premium, artisan craftsmanship, and enforce it consistently across the page.

Add a lightweight footer with brand reassurance and conversion-supporting links: Contact (mailto/phone text only), Shipping/Returns (static text section or modal), and a short brand note about handmade/craftsmanship.

new_feature_requests.summary: Design a high-converting landing page for an Indian handmade handicrafts gifting brand (curated/customized gift hampers) with warm, premium, artisan-focused design.
Add a minimal Motoko backend endpoint to store lead submissions (custom hamper inquiries) and return a confirmation response; persist submissions in stable storage so they survive canister upgrades.

projectName: Warm, premium artisan landing page for Indian handmade handicrafts gifting brand
